meanings.definition: Harm or damage caused to a person's body
meanings.sent1: The athlete suffered an injury during the game.
meanings.sent2: She went to the doctor after the injury from the fall.
meanings.sent3: The injury from the clumsy dance move made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt an injury deeper than any physical pain.
meanings.sent5: The injury left a visible mark on his arm.

meanings.definition: An act that causes harm or damage
meanings.sent1: The car accident resulted in a serious injury to the driver.
meanings.sent2: The injury to the painting was caused by rough handling.
meanings.sent3: The injury to the cake happened when the cat jumped on the table.
meanings.sent4: His words were like an injury to her feelings.
meanings.sent5: The injury to the tree was evident from the broken branches.

meanings.definition: A violation of someone's rights or reputation
meanings.sent1: The false accusation was an injury to his reputation.
meanings.sent2: She felt an injury to her privacy when her diary was read.
meanings.sent3: The injury to his rights was clear when he was denied a fair trial.
meanings.sent4: The gossip caused an injury to her social standing.
meanings.sent5: The injury to his reputation spread quickly through the town.
